name: Sombreros
description:
Originally created for the ACTION 52 OWNS project, Sombreros is a top-down shooter inspired both by the vaguely racist original game and countless western movies and games.

3 short but sweet levels full of set-pieces and lots of variety, wherein you might just have to throw molotov cocktails at a donkey or fend off ants with your breath.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move
X to fire
C to stop time (And X to place shots while time is frozen)

Featuring original music by Arthur Lee that kicks ass.

Requirements:

Windows
Keyboard
